pkgmetadata.longdescription:
## SHAPES RECOGNITION**shapes recognition** is a New Recognition Technology### Installation```pip install shapes-recognition```### About "shapes-recognition"Recognition is an intrinsic property of the human intellect. Kids around two years old recognize shapes even if they differ in size and position or are severely deformed.

To simulate such recognition capability, we introduce the **shapes-recognition** library.[Here](https://kravtsov-development.medium.com/amazing-ai-tables-44af52c993a2) we show how to use it.
